tooltip.breadium.breadium_star_extractor: This block extracts Breadium Star Fragments from a Breadium Star Core block.
tooltip.breadium.breadium_sword: §a§lHealing Crust§r - Heals the user upon hitting an enemy.
tooltip.breadium.breadium_pickaxe: §a§lBaker's Fortune§r - Drops XP when mining blocks.
tooltip.breadium.breadium_shovel: §a§lDiamond Dough§r - Diamonds have a small chance to drop when digging.
tooltip.breadium.breadium_axe: §a§lForest Whisper§r - Applies bone meal effect to saplings.
tooltip.breadium.breadium_hoe: §a§lHarvest Feast§r - Replants crops after harvesting them.
